content: the autumn walks cowl designed by stefanie huebner @stefsserenitycrochet instagram @stefsserenitycrochet ​ ravelry stefsserenity ​ email stefsserenitycrochet@gmail com ​ © 2019 -stef s serenity crafts and crochet materials ● about 425 yards of sock weight merino yarn i used hand dyed knot your momma s yarn in momma needs a java or equivalent ● f hook 3 75 mm ● yarn needle for final construction gauge 4 = 21 stitches ​ 4 = 9 5 row finished piece measures 10 inches tall by 11 inches wide stitches used us terms ● single_crochet ● double_crochet ● chain ● whipstitch directions this cowl is constructed as a rectangle then the two shorter edges are whipstitched ​ together chain 120 a repeat of 3 ​ row 1 single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook *skip 2 chain single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet in next chain* repeat from * to * ​ across to last 3 chain skip 2 chain single_crochet in last chain chain 1 turn © 2019 -stef s serenity crafts and crochet row 2 * single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet in 1st single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet* repeat from * to * across ending with single_crochet in last stitch of ​ the row chain 1 turn row 3 - 44 repeat row 2 ​ finishing tie off leaving a long tail fold your work so that the two shorter edges line up using ​ the long tail whipstitch the two edges together tie off and weave in ends please share your completed autumn walks cowl with me on instagram @stefsserenitycrochet use the hashtag #autumnwalkscowl this pattern is the intellectual property of stef s serenity crochet and should not be redistributed resold copied or translated without the express written permission of stef s serenity crochet you are free to sell finished items made with this pattern however please credit stef s serenity crochet as the original designer the photos in this pattern are the property of stef s serenity crochet and should not be used for any purpose without the express written consent of stef s serenity crochet all rights reserved © 2019 -stef s serenity crafts and crochet
